name: Don't be the Last
description: The game will randomly generate a game, and it will tell your either Don't be the Last too make it to the top, Don't be the Last to Reach the Checkpoint, and Don't be the Last to Kill Yourself. The first game mode, which is  Don't be the Last too make it to the top, is where lava rises up and you have to  be the first one to make it too the top in order to win. The second game, which is Don't be the Last to Reach the Checkpoint, is where you got to reach the flag first in order to win that game mode. The final and last one, which is Don't be the Last to Kill Yourself, is where you have to find a way to kill yourself before your opponent kills himself first.
